title: unnai bhajikka
sahitya:
unnai bhajikka varam tA vAzhvil oru nALum iraivA nin tirut-tALai maravAmal


anupallavi

  annai kalpaka valli maruvum maNALa kapAli apAra krpAkara hara enru
 


caraNam    ivvulagam tanil uLLa viSaya bhOgam ellAm anubhavit-aluttEn aiyA kavvum aimpulan ennaik-kaTTiyizhukkudinnum kalangu madimai pollAk-kurangu manamaDanga
